summary: "Rocky" is a 1976 American movie about a poor boxer named Rocky Balboa, played by Sylvester Stallone, who gets a chance to fight for the world heavyweight championship. Stallone wrote the script in three days and insisted on playing the lead role. Filmed in Philadelphia, the movie cost less than $1 million to make but became a huge hit, earning $225 million worldwide. It won three Academy Awards, including Best Picture, and started a popular film series. "Rocky" is now seen as a classic American sports drama.
title: Rocky
